"I was going through these empty buildings... Looking for anything
"I found a wheelchair from a building a bit over there..."
"It's just what I've been looking for! A wheelchair for Olivia!"
"That's the girl with the glasses, from the train."
"It's not my place to explain her condition though. So I hope
you don't mention anything to her."
"Ha ha, I can't believe I actually found one."
"I'm taking this to her right away. So see you at the train!"
"Actually, before I go... There's someone I need to warn you
"Maybe you've seen the man too? A mime-looking man in white baggy
clothing...\. With a twisted grin on his face."
"We ransacked a building earlier, I was in the second floor when
I heard the stairwell door open up downstairs..."
"The door gave a loud creak and a menacing giggle was
"That villain seemed to know exactly where I was hiding and homed
in on me, destroying the apartment doors and all other obstacles
"All the while he just seemed amused. Taunting me with his whip
"Something about him... I don't think he was a human anymore,
"If you see him, just run. Don't even try to start a fight with
"I think I know who you're talking about..."
"I think I know who you're talking about..."
"Oh you do? Well then... Be on your guard. He seems to be patrolling
"Be on your guard. He seems to be patrolling the city streets..."
"Well then... Good luck. And see you later."

"I think I know who you're talking about..."
"I think I know who you're talking about..."

\N[16] is staring calmly at the distant horizon...

\N[19] seems itchy and twitchy. He is constantly scratching

\N[28] has got an oddly pleased expression on his face. His
disturbed smile gives you the creeps...
\N[29] looks very tense and stiff. Seems like he cannot have
a moment's rest as he's waiting for your next orders.
"This is the actual city of Prehevil?"
"Wow... I didn't realize how big it was."
"So many abandoned homes and houses. Where did all the people go?"
"This place looks massive... How do we even know where to go?"
"The city feels very eerie with no one around..."
"The mist lingers and twists into shapes that almost look like
humans, but no... It's just us... and the nightmares that roam
"Finally we're in the city! Let's find the local authorities and
"I try to check the windows and lone alleyways in hopes of
catching just a glimpse of someone sane, but no..."
"I'm starting to think we really are the only ones left."
"The world needs to know about this! A tragedy of these
proportions can't be swiped under the rug!"
"Running can be good exercise, but you can never run fast enough to
escape your troubles and sadness. That's why I picked up boxing, you
can face your adversaries head on."
"I really need a drink. There has to be a bar nearby, right?"
"I got a feeling that these alleyways will haunt my nightmares
"You mentioned Prehevil being your hometown, right?"
"How does it feel being back here?"
"Yup, I can relate to that. I'm having very mixed feels about
"I bet everyone who got away from this backwater town regrets
"But the regret is mixed with some weird nostalgia..."
"It's weird... Seeing your hometown turn into a ghost town..."
"Quite literally a ghost town... Only those nightmarish husks
"It's weirdly nostalgic to be back here..."
"I grew up playing on these stairs. Jumping from stair to stair..."
"This city does have a certain charm to it..."
"It's rare to find places where ancient rites of the old world
would be as prevalent as here."
"I'm not sure if that's a good thing as far as we are considered..."
"The world doesn't center around select few lost souls like us.
It is good for the greater scheme of things. Some things should

"Here I am busy with my own business, completely ignoring this
"All apologies, pleased to meet you! You can call me Pocketcat."
You hear voices echoing from the beheaded wizard...
\c[7]"Oh, it's this little pubic hair in your throat again.\. I've had
the unfortunate pleasure of meeting this wretched creant before.
You hear voices echoing from the beheaded wizard...
\c[7]"Don't let his flattery and jolly old accent fool you, he's
a slave to the trickster god."\c[0]
You hear voices echoing from the beheaded wizard...
\c[7]"Whatever he asks is in service to the all seeing one in the sky."\c[0]
"You have one of those familiar faces. I feel like we've met
somewhere before. Perhaps in a past life?"
"Things sure have changed since then, haven't they? We live in
"The world has gone through true darkness. The world has been at
a standstill. In a deep rest."
"People stocked up on toilet paper and hid in their homes with
their loved ones. They were waiting for that glimpse of light just
because they knew that even the darkness has a breaking point."
"Say old sport, what do you think follows such intense darkness?"
"It has to be light. More peaceful times."
"It has to be light. More peaceful times."
"Oh yes I remember you're the eternal optimist. That is the reason
"Well ain'tcha a killjoy! But I understand. I understand. Dark
"Yes. Not light or darkness, but gray. Very insightful indeed."
"Yes. Change is the only thing inevitable."
"Oh pardon me. I am sorry if I took your time. I don't mean to
"From personal experience, I'd say a true darkness is followed
"The mind, or the common conciousness we all share strives for
"When one is truly done with the darkness, one strives for new
with such vigor that growing pains are inevitable."
"But there lies the danger, you see chaos can ragdoll us into
"The direction is not always towards the light. Sometimes one
can find themselves lost in a limbo that is the chaos."
"When you enter the limbo from a dark place, there is a big chance
that you contaminate the chaos with your darkness and just create
a new pitch black place. Maybe even darker than the one before?"
"I guess I'm just rambling here. 'Letting my mind wander and mouth
"You know me. When I get excited, I can go on and on and on..."
"I didn't mean to take your time."
"From what I understand you've got your hands full with the festival
"So I'll get straight to the point."
"Not only a wandering gentleman, but I am also a heads salesman of
"What is a heads salesman you ask?"
"Well it is exactly what it sounds. I'm willing to part from my
valuable collection if the price is right. And the price is severed
heads of those participating in the festival."
"Macabre, I know. But you get used to it. God knows I did."
"It truly was a pleasure to meet you once again, but I fear I
"The tower you were heading towards... It's to the east of here,
just beyond the church's hidden passage."
"Let us meet again there. Perhaps I'll even have a special deal
for you. My pockets are VERY deep you see..."
"But until that time old sport, take care, take care."
